Posts.Content: hiALFONSO35                      I. STILL am havng radiation  i have to have 5weeks then they take test to see iff i need more.i live in  NSW Australia.  As yet they havnt said anything about chemo so fingerse crossed.i had left breast off june 24  .2010. di d you have a breast off?an d are you on aromasin.  i seem to be geting problems with my eyes they seem to fog up dont no iff its the radiation.  Would love to hear more from you i still feel im in a dream and its not happening to  me

Posts.Content: could anyone tell me how long after taking Aromasin after food can you eat again.i usualt take it after eating my tea love to hear from anyone
Posts.Title: breast cancer tablets

Posts.Content: hi     i read your news on aromasin .i had left breast removed and 3nymnodes i was put on armasin just 3weeks ago after other tablets didnt work. i have started with realy bad pains in both lower legs also bad cramps in feet.docter sent me for blood clot scan .it came back clear.so wondering if its the tablets also.im sorry for your pain hope you soon feel better.
